lender.name: Ryan

lender.occupational_info: i put the clothes in the washer in a world record time and then listen intently for the washer to stop, then i transfer the clothes to the dryer at a world record time

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I've always wondered about how much my donated dollar really helps individual people. This opportunity allows me to personalize the experience of helping someone, while encouraging them to succeed. And also because I want my 5 kids to realize that life is not just about them, but about all of us, the people of the world, working together to make life better for everyone we come in to contact with.
lender.occupational_info: I coach a variety of sports emphasizing sportsmanship, hard work, fun, creativity, teamwork and respect. I also teach kids about all the different exercise opportunities there are, in hopes that they will find one that they like and will do on their own, so that they will be healthier throughout their life. And I'm the big one in my picture, giving my daughter bunny ears, as Bunny is the nickname I call her.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love giving to help people have a chance to live their dreams.

lender.name: Jenkins-Mob
lender.loan_because: it is the fair and right thing to do, we are lucky to live where we do and everyone should be able to have a happy and safe life. This is how we can help.
lender.occupational_info: 1 Working with Indigenous Australians to manage their land and deliver social, cultural and economic benefits. 2. Working with local community. 3. learning to be concerned citizens.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I can sympathize with regular people moving great ideas of independence and prosperity into action through entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I come up with creative solutions to people's problems and show them how they can make it happen.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: my parents come from very poor families who lacked opportunities and financial help to support them. They were not able to get an education. i loan so that parents in third world countries help their children be successful.
lender.occupational_info: i go to school 9 months a year. During my summer i work at a day camp, lifeguard at a pool, and work at a gym.

lender.name: victor
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in the power of micro finance and in the support we can give to empower those who are able.

lender.name: Henry Ramp
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people improve their lives with something as simple as a loan.

lender.loan_because: As a student, education and development through hard work is very important to me on a personal level. I want to financially assist those who work hard and need a little extra help.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: You only keep what you give away.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the development and marketing of web sites.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: Micro finance loans deliver far more than charitable donations. When a loan is repaid, I can lend it back out!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a brewery here in Canada, and I sell beer to bars, restaurants and liquor stores. It is a very satisfying job.

lender.name: Sherwin Yanzy
lender.loan_because: Purchase film equipments like professional video camera, sound equipment, computer, and software. We have revolving dedicated volunteers who want to contribute to the industry, but we have to either rent our equipment or borrow them. For a startup company, this leads to depreciating cash flow and disruption of work process and schedule.
lender.occupational_info: We are revolutionizing the entertainment broadcasting industry in Singapore by developing a new breed of celebrities and production crew. We give people who aspire to contribute in the showbiz industry to enhance their skills and build their portfolio by encouraging them to create their own materials as how professionals would, then showcase them in our website. We provide a platform that suits the Singapore's busy society and culture therefore we will be able to reach a wider audience than the traditional way of broadcasting. Ultimately, we aim to improve the local entertainment scene in Singapore with more local movies, music, videos, models, actors, actresses, directors, writers, producers, etc.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer who is currently getting a masters in Peace Operations and working at an organization that does nuclear nonproliferation. I would love to see world peace!

lender.occupational_info: I am studying politics and culture.

lender.name: Diolt web marketing
lender.occupational_info:
We are an SEO company specializes in improving the visibility of our clients website over the internet. This is primarily done through organic search engine optimization. SEO is the process by which we ensure a website appears high in the organic search results, in google, yahoo, msn, and other search engines. This has proven to provide an ongoing long-term stream of visitors. We obtain good ranking through a combination of search orientated PR, targeted relevant link building and by altering the website so they are as search engine friendly as possible.
Benefits of SEO:
Your website is the foundation of your Internet business and represents your Internet brand. Diolt.com specializes in helping you to build your Internet brand in the most affordable and optimal way. SEO affects the quality of your storefront SEO has a direct impact on your business success A website with properly done SEO has higher prospect retention A website with properly completed SEO typically receives more free advertising from search engines A website with properly done SEO attracts highly targeted prospects that convert A website with properly done SEO saves you both time and money A website with properly done SEO will almost always make you money

lender.occupational_info: Marion is a receptionist at a medical practice. Ian is a former university lecturer, now running his own very small engineering consultancy business.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a nifty way to reach out to others and help make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have someone help me out and make a difference in my life. Other people should have that experience and hopefully it will make a difference in theirs.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Turning trash to art

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: Climb tall towers and fix crazy machines that produce irregular amounts of electricity according to the way the wind blows.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I have seen the poverty . . . and the resourcefulness. . . in the developing world. My loans help alleviate one and celebrate the other.

lender.name: Laureen
lender.loan_because: It's one small thing I can do to help someone become independent and hopefully improve someone's life.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I can afford to.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I heard about it on the Tavis Smiley show and realized it was a really good thing to do.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer in California in the United States.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I consider myself a citizen of the world.

lender.name: Jarom
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to help me out too.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: "From her beacon-hand Glows world-wide welcome"

lender.name: Mackenzie
lender.loan_because: I love to be able to help others.
